content.content: This is a discussions thread for EIP-4430, described transactions.
content.GPT-summary: The post is a discussion thread for EIP-4430, which is about described transactions. The author of the proposal is not explicitly asking for feedback, but the post is open for discussion, and third parties are asking questions and reviewing the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: Thanks for starting this. Looking forward to helping with this.

Hey Richard - love this. I’m working on something similar that I would also hope eventually is implemented as an EIP. But first working on getting a demo up of describing transactions. After reading through the EIP (link), it looks like it’s more focused on a pre-transaction description, while what I’m working on is generally for post-transaction description for people to be able to understand what happened. Here’s the tech spec I’ve been working off of. Let’s chat more some time?
